question: The "European Route-E20" runs through which countries?
option1: Ireland, United Kingdom, Denmark, Sweden, Estonia, Russia
option2: Ireland, United Kingdom, Denmark, Norway, Sweden, Finland
option3: Ireland, United Kingdom, Germany, Poland, Ukraine, Russia
option4: Ireland, United Kingdom, Netherlands, Germany, Poland, Ukraine
answer: Ireland, United Kingdom, Denmark, Sweden, Estonia, Russia
explanation: European Roue-E20 is a part of the United Nations International E-road Network which passes through Ireland, United Kingdom, Denmark, Sweden, Estonia and Russia. It runs from the Shannon Airport of Ireland to the Saint Petersburg of Russia. Its total length is 1880 km.
